summary.para: The SIZE structure defines the width and height of a rectangle.

remarks.para: The rectangle dimensions stored in this structure can correspond to viewport extents, window extents, text extents, bitmap dimensions, or the aspect-ratio filter for some extended functions.

summary.para: Specifies the rectangle's width. The units depend on which function uses this structure.
Specifies the rectangle's height. The units depend on which function uses this structure.
